dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Taking the treatment of 1 t of sediment as a functional unit, the rated power of the tube furnace in the pyrolysis section was 4 kW, the no-load power was 1.4 kW, N2 was passed for 2~3 minutes before the reaction to ensure the anaerobic environment, and the final temperature of the pyrolysis was selected to be 350℃.

以处理1 t 污泥为功能单位。1）运输环节采用载重5t卡车，运输距离2 km；2）干化环节采用空心桨叶干化机，功率55 kW，整个干化系统规模为50 t/d，24 h工作制；3）热解环节管式炉额定功率4 kW，空载功率1.4 kW，反应前通入2~3 分钟N2以保证无氧环境，热解终温选定350℃；4）热解所产气体首先经过冷却装置，冷凝收集液体成分主要为可以回收利用的生物油，回收分离出的可燃性气体，固体半焦可用作吸附剂。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The tube furnace has a rated power of 4 kW and a no-load power of 1.4 kW. N2 is introduced for 2-3 minutes before the reaction to ensure an anaerobic environment. The final pyrolysis temperature is selected as 350 °C.
热解环节管式炉额定功率4 kW，空载功率1.4 kW，反应前通入2~3 分钟N2以保证无氧环境，热解终温选定350℃
technology.technologicalApplicability: The described industrial process involves ex-situ thermal treatment of sediment, specifically, pyrolysis for remediating 1 tonne of sludge as a functional unit. This process is operationalized in a project setting where the transportation phase utilizes a 5-tonne truck over a distance of 2 km. The drying phase employs a hollow blade dryer with a power rating of 55 kW, with the entire drying system handling a capacity of 50 tonnes/day on a 24-hour operational schedule. The pyrolysis phase utilises a tubular furnace with a rated power of 4 kW and an idling power of 1.4 kW. Before the reaction, nitrogen is fed for 2-3 minutes to ensure an oxygen-free environment. The end temperature for pyrolysis is set at 350°C. The gases produced in pyrolysis are first passed through a cooling unit, with the condensation collection predominantly consisting of bio-oil, which has a high calorific value and can be recuperated for reuse.

所描述的工业过程涉及底泥的异位热处理，具体是将1吨污泥作为功能单位进行热解修复。该过程在项目设置中进行，运输阶段使用载重5吨的卡车运输距离为2公里。干化阶段采用55千瓦的空心桨叶干燥机，并且整个干燥系统的处理能力为每天50吨，按24小时工作制度运行。热解阶段使用额定功率为4千瓦、空载功率为1.4千瓦的管式炉。反应前通入2-3分钟氮气以确保无氧环境。热解的最终温度设定为350°C。热解产生的气体首先通过冷却装置，冷凝收集的液体成分主要是具有较高热值、可回收利用的生物油。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: For Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) practitioners using this data set, it is crucial to consider the specificities of the transportation phase, drying system, and pyrolysis equipment detailed in this data. Ensure accurate modeling of the transportation distance, energy consumption of the drying phase, and the operational characteristics of the pyrolysis phase. Nitrogen input and the absence of oxygen during the thermal treatment must also be reflected in the environmental impact assessment. When calculating the potential energy recovery, the calorific value of the bio-oil produced should be incorporated. For cases where methodological consistency is needed, adhere to the assumptions and parameters outlined within the scope of this data set, and beware of boundary conditions when integrating with other data sets.
对于使用该数据集的生命周期评价（LCA）实践者来说，考虑数据中详述的运输阶段、干化系统和热解设备的具体性质至关重要。确保准确地建模运输距离、干化阶段的能源消耗以及热解阶段的操作特性。在环境影响评估中还必须反映在热处理期间的氮气输入和无氧环境。在计算可能的能量回收时，应纳入生产的生物油的热值。如果需要方法论的一致性，请坚持使用数据集范围内概述的假设和参数，并在与其他数据集整合时注意边界条件。
